alert.note: Alert for Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 8:51PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Churchill and south central Pershing Counties through 945 PM PDT... At 850 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles east of Trinity Junction, or 21 miles south of Lovelock, moving north at 25 mph. This will impact portions of I-80 near Lovelock. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 55 mph and blowing dust. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Blowing dust may reduce visibility. Locations impacted include... Lovelock, Junction I 80 And Nv 396/857 (exit 112), Lovelock Derby Field Airport and Lone Rock. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
